branchCategory.name: IDG
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Offered in a single unit or a combination unit type <LI>+5, -4, -40 and -76°F atmospheric dew point options (-15, -20, -40, and -60°C) <LI>10 sizes available <LI>Dew point indicator standard on most sizes <LI>Max. inlet air temperature: 122°F / 50°C <LI>Connections: NPT, Rc or G threads<BR></LI></UL>

branchItem.name: IDG, Membrane Air Dryer Series
IDG*M, Membrane Air Dryer, Mist Separator, Micro Mist Separator
IDG*V, Membrane Air Dryer, Mist Separator, Micro Mist Separator, Regulator
IDG, Bracket Assembly, Air Dryer Series
IDG, Replacement Dew Point Indicator
branchItem.description: <p>Replacement dew point indicator allows visual confirmation that air is drying. For use with Series IDG Membrane Air Dryers. Includes O-ring.</p>
